Moreover thou shalt make<S>6213</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S> with ten<S>6235</S> curtains<S>3407</S> of fine twined<S>7806</S> linen<S>8336</S>, and blue<S>8504</S>, and purple<S>713</S>, and scarlet<S>8144</S> <S>8438</S>: with cherubims<S>3742</S> of cunning<S>2803</S> work<S>4639</S> shalt thou make<S>6213</S> them. <sup>of cunning: Heb. the work of a cunning workman, or, embroiderer</sup>
The length<S>753</S> of one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S> shall be eight<S>8083</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> cubits<S>520</S>, and the breadth<S>7341</S> of one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S> four<S>702</S> cubits<S>520</S>: and every one of the curtains<S>3407</S> shall have one<S>259</S> measure<S>4060</S>.
The five<S>2568</S> curtains<S>3407</S> shall be coupled together<S>2266</S> one<S>802</S> to another<S>269</S>; and other five<S>2568</S> curtains<S>3407</S> shall be coupled<S>2266</S> one<S>802</S> to another<S>269</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> loops<S>3924</S> of blue<S>8504</S> upon the edge<S>8193</S> of the one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S> from the selvedge<S>7098</S> in the coupling<S>2279</S>; and likewise shalt thou make<S>6213</S> in the uttermost<S>7020</S> edge<S>8193</S> of another curtain<S>3407</S>, in the coupling<S>4225</S> of the second<S>8145</S>.
Fifty<S>2572</S> loops<S>3924</S> shalt thou make<S>6213</S> in the one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S>, and fifty<S>2572</S> loops<S>3924</S> shalt thou make<S>6213</S> in the edge<S>7097</S> of the curtain<S>3407</S> that is in the coupling<S>4225</S> of the second<S>8145</S>; that the loops<S>3924</S> may take hold<S>6901</S> one<S>802</S> of another<S>269</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> fifty<S>2572</S> taches<S>7165</S> of gold<S>2091</S>, and couple<S>2266</S> the curtains<S>3407</S> together with<S>802</S> <S>269</S> the taches<S>7165</S>: and it shall be one<S>259</S> tabernacle<S>4908</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> curtains<S>3407</S> of goats'<S>5795</S> hair to be a covering<S>168</S> upon the tabernacle<S>4908</S>: eleven<S>6249</S> <S>6240</S> curtains<S>3407</S> shalt thou make<S>6213</S>.
The length<S>753</S> of one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S> shall be thirty<S>7970</S> cubits<S>520</S>, and the breadth<S>7341</S> of one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S> four<S>702</S> cubits<S>520</S>: and the eleven<S>6249</S> <S>6240</S> curtains<S>3407</S> shall be all of one<S>259</S> measure<S>4060</S>.
And thou shalt couple<S>2266</S> five<S>2568</S> curtains<S>3407</S> by themselves, and six<S>8337</S> curtains<S>3407</S> by themselves, and shalt double<S>3717</S> the sixth<S>8345</S> curtain<S>3407</S> in the forefront<S>4136</S> <S>6440</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> fifty<S>2572</S> loops<S>3924</S> on the edge<S>8193</S> of the one<S>259</S> curtain<S>3407</S> that is outmost<S>7020</S> in the coupling<S>2279</S>, and fifty<S>2572</S> loops<S>3924</S> in the edge<S>8193</S> of the curtain<S>3407</S> which coupleth<S>2279</S> the second<S>8145</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> fifty<S>2572</S> taches<S>7165</S> of brass<S>5178</S>, and put<S>935</S> the taches<S>7165</S> into the loops<S>3924</S>, and couple<S>2266</S> the tent<S>168</S> together, that it may be one<S>259</S>. <sup>tent: or, covering</sup>
And the remnant<S>5629</S> that remaineth<S>5736</S> of the curtains<S>3407</S> of the tent<S>168</S>, the half<S>2677</S> curtain<S>3407</S> that remaineth<S>5736</S>, shall hang<S>5628</S> over the backside<S>268</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>.
And a cubit<S>520</S> on the one side<S>2088</S>, and a cubit<S>520</S> on the other side of that which remaineth<S>5736</S> in the length<S>753</S> of the curtains<S>3407</S> of the tent<S>168</S>, it shall hang<S>5628</S> over the sides<S>6654</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> on this side and on that side, to cover<S>3680</S> it. <sup>of that: Heb. in the remainder, or, surplus</sup>
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> a covering<S>4372</S> for the tent<S>168</S> of rams'<S>352</S> skins<S>5785</S> dyed red<S>119</S>, and a covering<S>4372</S> above<S>4605</S> of badgers'<S>8476</S> skins<S>5785</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> boards<S>7175</S> for the tabernacle<S>4908</S> of shittim<S>7848</S> wood<S>6086</S> standing up<S>5975</S>.
Ten<S>6235</S> cubits<S>520</S> shall be the length<S>753</S> of a board<S>7175</S>, and a cubit<S>520</S> and a half<S>2677</S> shall be the breadth<S>7341</S> of one<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S>.
Two<S>8147</S> tenons<S>3027</S> shall there be in one<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S>, set in order<S>7947</S> one<S>802</S> against another<S>269</S>: thus shalt thou make<S>6213</S> for all the boards<S>7175</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>. <sup>tenons: Heb. hands</sup>
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> the boards<S>7175</S> for the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, twenty<S>6242</S> boards<S>7175</S> on the south<S>5045</S> side<S>6285</S> southward<S>8486</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> forty<S>705</S> sockets<S>134</S> of silver<S>3701</S> under the twenty<S>6242</S> boards<S>7175</S>; two<S>8147</S> sockets<S>134</S> under one<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S> for his two<S>8147</S> tenons<S>3027</S>, and two<S>8147</S> sockets<S>134</S> under another<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S> for his two<S>8147</S> tenons<S>3027</S>.
And for the second<S>8145</S> side<S>6763</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> on the north<S>6828</S> side<S>6285</S> there shall be twenty<S>6242</S> boards<S>7175</S>:
And their forty<S>705</S> sockets<S>134</S> of silver<S>3701</S>; two<S>8147</S> sockets<S>134</S> under one<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S>, and two<S>8147</S> sockets<S>134</S> under another<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S>.
And for the sides<S>3411</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> westward<S>3220</S> thou shalt make<S>6213</S> six<S>8337</S> boards<S>7175</S>.
And two<S>8147</S> boards<S>7175</S> shalt thou make<S>6213</S> for the corners<S>4742</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> in the two sides<S>3411</S>.
And they shall be coupled<S>8382</S> together beneath<S>4295</S>, and they shall be coupled<S>8382</S> together<S>3162</S> above the head<S>7218</S> of it unto one<S>259</S> ring<S>2885</S>: thus shall it be for them both<S>8147</S>; they shall be for the two<S>8147</S> corners<S>4740</S>. <sup>coupled: Heb. twinned</sup>
And they shall be eight<S>8083</S> boards<S>7175</S>, and their sockets<S>134</S> of silver<S>3701</S>, sixteen<S>8337</S> <S>6240</S> sockets<S>134</S>; two<S>8147</S> sockets<S>134</S> under one<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S>, and two<S>8147</S> sockets<S>134</S> under another<S>259</S> board<S>7175</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> bars<S>1280</S> of shittim<S>7848</S> wood<S>6086</S>; five<S>2568</S> for the boards<S>7175</S> of the one<S>259</S> side<S>6763</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>,
And five<S>2568</S> bars<S>1280</S> for the boards<S>7175</S> of the other<S>8145</S> side<S>6763</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, and five<S>2568</S> bars<S>1280</S> for the boards<S>7175</S> of the side<S>6763</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S>, for the two sides<S>3411</S> westward<S>3220</S>.
And the middle<S>8484</S> bar<S>1280</S> in the midst<S>8432</S> of the boards<S>7175</S> shall reach<S>1272</S> from end<S>7097</S> to end<S>7097</S>.
And thou shalt overlay<S>6823</S> the boards<S>7175</S> with gold<S>2091</S>, and make<S>6213</S> their rings<S>2885</S> of gold<S>2091</S> for places<S>1004</S> for the bars<S>1280</S>: and thou shalt overlay<S>6823</S> the bars<S>1280</S> with gold<S>2091</S>.
And thou shalt rear up<S>6965</S> the tabernacle<S>4908</S> according to the fashion<S>4941</S> thereof which was shewed<S>7200</S> thee in the mount<S>2022</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> a vail<S>6532</S> of blue<S>8504</S>, and purple<S>713</S>, and scarlet<S>8144</S> <S>8438</S>, and fine twined<S>7806</S> linen<S>8336</S> of cunning<S>2803</S> work<S>4639</S>: with cherubims<S>3742</S> shall it be made<S>6213</S>:
And thou shalt hang<S>5414</S> it upon four<S>702</S> pillars<S>5982</S> of shittim<S>7848</S> wood overlaid<S>6823</S> with gold<S>2091</S>: their hooks<S>2053</S> shall be of gold<S>2091</S>, upon the four<S>702</S> sockets<S>134</S> of silver<S>3701</S>.
And thou shalt hang up<S>5414</S> the vail<S>6532</S> under the taches<S>7165</S>, that thou mayest bring<S>935</S> in thither within<S>1004</S> the vail<S>6532</S> the ark<S>727</S> of the testimony<S>5715</S>: and the vail<S>6532</S> shall divide<S>914</S> unto you between the holy<S>6944</S> place and the most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S>.
And thou shalt put<S>5414</S> the mercy seat<S>3727</S> upon the ark<S>727</S> of the testimony<S>5715</S> in the most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S> place.
And thou shalt set<S>7760</S> the table<S>7979</S> without<S>2351</S> the vail<S>6532</S>, and the candlestick<S>4501</S> over against<S>5227</S> the table<S>7979</S> on the side<S>6763</S> of the tabernacle<S>4908</S> toward the south<S>8486</S>: and thou shalt put<S>5414</S> the table<S>7979</S> on the north<S>6828</S> side<S>6763</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> an hanging<S>4539</S> for the door<S>6607</S> of the tent<S>168</S>, of blue<S>8504</S>, and purple<S>713</S>, and scarlet<S>8438</S> <S>8144</S>, and fine twined<S>7806</S> linen<S>8336</S>, wrought<S>4639</S> with needlework<S>7551</S>.
And thou shalt make<S>6213</S> for the hanging<S>4539</S> five<S>2568</S> pillars<S>5982</S> of shittim<S>7848</S> wood, and overlay<S>6823</S> them with gold<S>2091</S>, and their hooks<S>2053</S> shall be of gold<S>2091</S>: and thou shalt cast<S>3332</S> five<S>2568</S> sockets<S>134</S> of brass<S>5178</S> for them.
